short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to save entire webpage in mhtml format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebSaver - Easily save your web pages in MHTML format

With WebSaver, save any web page directly to your local drive in MHTML format in one click. Whether you're researching, compiling data, or simply want to keep an offline copy of your favorite articles, WebSaver is the perfect tool for keeping a complete, easily accessible version of your important web content.

Key Features:

Fast backup: Instantly save complete web pages, with layout and embedded media, in MHTML format.
Offline Access: Access your saved pages anytime, even without an Internet connection.
Ease of Use: An intuitive user interface that makes saving web pages as easy as clicking a button.
Lightweight and efficient: WebSaver is designed to be fast and not weigh down your browser.
Security and confidentiality: No personal data is collected or sent. Your web pages remain private and secure on your own device.
Why choose WebSaver?

For researchers and students: Keep track of your sources without worrying about them disappearing or being changed online.
For avid readers: Save articles or blogs for offline, distraction-free reading.
For professionals: Keep reference copies of important documents or company web pages.
Start saving your web pages conveniently and reliably now with WebSaver.
